value:
Aaah—I just came to give out gifts!
Nothing suspicious here! Sorry!

I was born on the twelfth of the
Ethereal Moon, right in the middle
of winter. Still hate the cold, though...

I don't know why everyone's asking
me what I want now. I've been saying
for ages I just want to be left alone!

Did you say burn a candle...or Bernie
candle?! Aaah! Please don't make a
candle out of meeee!

Ugh, why'd you have to wear such
bright colors, Bernie?! Nobody wants
to see you stand out like this. Stupid!

Um...hi. I brought you a winter festival
gift from $Nf. Can
I go now?

Is it over? It's over, right? We're all
finished here? Can I go?

Home feels so far away.
I miss my room...

Aaah! Careful! Last time someone
snuck up on me like that, I fainted
standing up!

You have a gift? For me? R-really?
Wait...is this a trick?

Um, hi. I'm Bernadetta. It's cold out,
so I'll just be in my... Huh? Festival?
What did I do to deserve this?!

If nothing else, this festival's shown
me different people enjoy holidays
differently, $Nu.$k$pSome folks want big, loud gatherings.
I get it, sort of, but that's...definitely
not me.$k$pEven so, I think it did me good to
come out a little. I'm kind of amazed
I didn't completely hate it, honestly.$k$pSo...I feel like I should thank you.
Because without you, I wouldn't
have even tried.$k$pHowever it might turn out, it's no
good for me to decide I'd hate
something before giving it a chance.$k$pWait, what? There are MORE of these
festivals?! No way, forget it! One was
enough! Count me ooouuut!
えいっ！
Go away!
へぶっ！
みぎゃあ！
A festival...how grim.
You want this. Right!?
So hungry...
It's so cold!
Why did I leave my room?
ぬふふふ…
Festivals would be perfect...if there weren't other people around.
Aaaah! I mean, um... It'll take more than that to s-sneak up on me!
Snow is so nice. I want to build a snowy cave and shut myself inside.
My perfect gift would be a room just for me...with a lock. A big lock.
Don't look! You'll spoil the present I'm making for you...
♪Hm hm-hm...♪ Ah! How long have you been standing there?!
I feel comfortable around you. It's making me sleepy...
A-all right!
♪Hm-hm... Festival!♪
I can do it...maybe.
